review: The Fire tv stick is a good product not great , it needs a usb  port and the interface needs work ,it's just not a natural flow . I think u could stand to explore Roku and consider making some changes. But this is still a nice product with a good price. Amazon should also consider adding free to air Network tv to there devices now that in my opinion would be next level and seal the deal for a lot more people , if your using the internet already it would be simpler to get live network programing  without using a tv antenna . Well what i mean is this should be added free just like it was meant to be free over the air . Thanks !
